definition: palace of the Dragon King at the bottom of the Eastern Sea
palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale
Rumphius's slit shell (Entemnotrochus rumphii), found in Japan and Taiwan

sentences.english: There is a Yonggungsa nautical miles, is home to the dragon king and his descendants.
sentences.chinese: 海里有一座龍宮，住着龍王和他的子孫。

sentences.english: Professor Thitinan Pongsudhirak is an expert on Thai politics at Bangkok's Chulalongkorn University.
sentences.chinese: 曼谷朱拉龍宮大學泰國政治專家旁蘇迪拉克說。

sentences.english: Goku may be ghosts and goblins have been eliminated or captured, as early as left the Dragon King's palace.
sentences.chinese: 可能是妖魔鬼怪已被悟空消滅或生擒，早離開了龍宮。

definition: the eye cannot take it all in (idiom); too many good things to see/a feast for the eyes
living spirit, living image (idiom); true to life/vivid and realistic
lit. ten thousand stampeding horses (idiom)/fig. with great momentum/going full speed ahead
Lingshan county in Qinzhou 欽州|钦州[Qin1 zhou1], Guangxi
legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods
(of a supernatural or divine being) to appear/to make itself manifest
